original_text: And if a man's hair falls out from his forehead, he has baldness of the forehead; he is clean.
korean_text: 앞머리가 빠져도 그는 이마 대머리니 정하니라

sentences.original_text: And if a man's hair falls out from his forehead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 어떤 사람의 머리털이 이마에서 빠지면

sentences.original_text: he has baldness of the forehead
